name: THAT Conference 2019
description: Microservices is the hot new architecture, but like any
other technology, it's not perfect. Too often, we embrace
technologies without exploring or considering the potential downsides.
In this talk, you will hear an unbiased and language agnostic
discussion around Microservices, the good, the bad, and the ugly. Along
the way, I will share what Iâ€™ve learned over the past year from going
from zero to production. After this talk, you will have a better
understanding of what to consider when looking at adopting a
